Products.Add'l Notes: Notion combines many productivity solutions into one, allowing for customizability and higher integration among tools.
Products.Messaging: A unified workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Used for project management and personal organization.
Products.Name: Notion
Products.Pricing: Free: $0/month, Personal Pro: $4/month, Team: $8/user/month, Enterprise: Custom pricing
